aggregatorDescriptor.descriptionHtml: An aggregator that computes an average.

parameterDescriptor.name: varName
parameterDescriptor.description: The source band used for aggregation.

parameterDescriptor.name: targetName
parameterDescriptor.description: The name prefix for the resulting bands. If empty, the source band name is used.

parameterDescriptor.name: weightCoeff
parameterDescriptor.description: The number of spatial observations to the power of this value will define the value for weighting the sums. Zero means observation count weighting is disabled.

parameterDescriptor.name: outputCounts
parameterDescriptor.description: If true, the result will include the count of all valid values

parameterDescriptor.name: outputSums
parameterDescriptor.description: If true, the result will include the sum of all values.

processorDescriptor.descriptionHtml: This band maths operator can be used to create a product with multiple bands based on mathematical expression. All products specified as source must have the same width and height, otherwise the operator will fail. The geo-coding information and metadata for the target product is taken from the first source product.
